title: Classic
alt: Someone get that Pachelbel's Canon kid a recording contract, stat.
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting in front of a turntable, listening to Stairway to Heaven by Led Zeppelin. A guitarist (possibly meant to be Jimmy Page) can be seen in an inset in the top left corner of the first two panels.]
Song: And as we wind on down the road, our shadows taller than our soulSong: When all is one and one is all, to be a rock and not to roooollSong [fading away]: And she's buying a stairway to HeavenCueball: Man. The Baby Boomers are kicking our ASSES.
Cueball: We need to get it together, guys.
